properties.name: clojure-component.nrepl-port
properties.description: The port number on which the nREPL server runs.

properties.name: clojure-component.nrepl-start
properties.description: Whether to start the nREPL server automatically.

properties.description: The root path of the Clojure component.

properties.name: clojure-component.init-symbol
properties.description: The fully qualified Clojure symbol used for initialization.
